ModMetaData.name: More Violence Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 7 new genes, 4 melee damage genes and 3 aggression genes. The melee genes change melee damage to 25%, 125%, 175%, and 200% respectively. Violence Hatred and Dislike allow for violent actions to be taken, but having a ranged weapon inflicts mood penalties of -40 and -20, and they have melee damage and social fight chances of 33% and 66% respectively. Mildly aggressive multiplies the violence and violent mental break chances by 1.5, and the prison break time is 80% of normal.
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url]
